title: Step Configuration
description: Event step that subscribes to 'variants.generated' events and emits 'image.generated' events to trigger video generation.

title: Gemini AI Integration
description: Initializes Google's Gemini 2.5 Flash Image Preview model for AI-powered UGC-style image generation with multimodal capabilities.

title: AI Image Generation
description: Downloads original image, converts to base64, and generates new UGC-style images using Gemini with detailed variant prompts including camera angles, lighting, and brand styling.

title: Image Extraction
description: Extracts generated image data from Gemini's response candidates and inline data structures, handling the API response format.

title: ImageKit CDN Upload
description: Uploads generated images to ImageKit CDN with sanitized filenames for persistent storage, fast delivery, and global distribution.

title: Event Emission
description: Emits 'image.generated' events with CDN URLs and variant metadata to trigger downstream video generation with Veo 3.
